lead_paragraph: A 3-1 home defeat of Newcastle United kept alive Southampton's hopes of playing European football next season and plunged the visitors closer to relegation on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Southampton Stroll to Victory Over Beleaguered Newcastle
headline.main: Southampton Stroll to Victory Over Beleaguered Newcastle

snippet: A 3-1 home defeat of Newcastle United kept alive Southampton's hopes of playing European football next season and plunged the visitors closer to relegation on Saturday....
